name: Indirect Command Execution By Program Compatibility Wizard
description: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant pcwrun.exe
false_positives: Need to use extra processing with 'unique_count' / 'filter' to focus on outliers as opposed to commonly seen artifacts
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.parent.executable:*\\pcwrun.exe`
